stories.original_headline: Ancient fingerprint found on 2,400-year-old Danish war boat
stories.original_summary: More than a century after its discovery, Scandinavia’s oldest plank boat is finally giving up new secrets. By analyzing ancient caulking and cords from the Hjortspring boat, researchers uncovered traces of pine pitch and animal fat — materials that likely came from pine-rich regions east of Denmark
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Mark Discovered on Timeless War Galley!
stories.fantasy_story: After ages, the Hjortspring War Galley has revealed a secret. Learned alchemists found an ancient mark upon its caulking. They also discovered traces of mystical pine resin and animal ointment, hinting at its origins from faraway eastern forests. This longship still holds many untold tales.

stories.original_headline: Samsung ad confirms rumors of a useful S26 ‘privacy display’
stories.original_summary: Samsung has released a new advertisement for its upcoming Galaxy S26 launch that all-but confirms rumors of a new display with a built-in privacy mode. Leaked videos show that the feature could be capable of entirely blacking out content from specific apps or parts of the display when viewed at an a
stories.fantasy_headline: Starfall Clan Reveals New Cloaking Scrying Glass!
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Starfall Clan has unveiled a grand proclamation for their latest Star Crystal Orbs. Whispers are now confirmed that these magical devices will feature a new Cloaking Scrying Glass. This enchantment can shroud specific visions from prying eyes, ensuring private messages remain unseen by others.

stories.original_headline: After spooking Hollywood, ByteDance will tweak safeguards on new AI model
stories.original_summary: TikTok creator ByteDance says that it is working to improve safeguards on its new AI video generator after Disney, Paramount, and Hollywood trade groups accused the tool of violating copyright protections. Concerns were raised after hyperrealistic videos generated by the Seedance 2.0 model went vira
stories.fantasy_headline: Whispering Scroll Guild Adjusts Illusionary Orb's Safeguards.
stories.fantasy_story: The Whispering Scroll Guild, famed for its master illusions, is enhancing its new Dream Weaver Apparatus. This comes after the Grand Storyteller Guilds accused the device of mimicking their cherished tales and magical designs. Startlingly lifelike illusions had spread far and wide, causing quite a stir among the creative clans.
